channel.title: Help [players wont save] help
channel.description:
When i log into my RSPS (using the TokkulScape/MeezyScape 508 source and client) i can play and have fun, but when i log out and go to edit a file on the source and compile everything, i log back in and it just starts back over with a starter account?
So does anyone know how to code/add in to save the players every-so-often or everytime they log out?
I appreciate your time! Thank you!

item.title: Help [players wont save] help
item.dc:creator: @jvisbeast jvisbeast
item.description:
@jvisbeast wrote:

Here is the video about my problem, dont forget to look in the description at the PlayerSave.java file link if you think that is the problem.

Thanks!

->VIDEO<-

Read full topic

item.title: Help [players wont save] help
item.dc:creator: @Wet_Dreamss Wet Dreamss
item.description:
@Wet_Dreamss wrote:

That sounds like a serious problem, check your PlayerSave.java!
Im sure you will be able to figure out the problem in there, look for something like an auto-world-wide-saver in there, to make your server save every like 10 seconds so people don’t have to worry about that problem ^.^

Read full topic

item.title: Help [players wont save] help
item.dc:creator: @jvisbeast jvisbeast
item.description:
@jvisbeast wrote:

[quote=“Kozs, post:2, topic:420485”][quote author=jvisbeast link=topic=523032.msg3804913#msg3804913 date=1320367708]
When i log into my RSPS (using the TokkulScape/MeezyScape 508 source and client) i can play and have fun, but when i log out and go to edit a file on the source and compile everything, i log back in and it just starts back over with a starter account?

So does anyone know how to code/add in to save the players every-so-often or everytime they log out?

I appreciate your time!
Thank you!
[/quote]

Sir I like your confidence are you exiting out with the source, or are you exiting out without logging out?[/quote]

I log out. but to close the server to edit stuff in the server i have to exit out at the topright hand corner “x”.
if this helps, later i will upload a video about my problem later on today.

dylan.hurley:

is their like a save button that works?

There is no save button.

Read full topic
